mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_group_setting( fGroupUuid, fOperationType, fMachineUsedPercent, fPage, fPageSize, fZhanneiPercent, fZhanwaiPercent, fKuaizhaoPercent, fBaiduSemPercent, fDragPercent, fSleepPer2Words, fSupportPaste, fMoveRandomly, fParentSearchEntry, fClearLocalStorage, fLessClickAtNight, fSameCityUser, fLocateTitlePosition, fBaiduAllianceEntry, fJustClickSpecifiedTitle, fRandomlyClickMoreLink, fMoveUp20, fWaitTimeAfterOpenBaidu, fWaitTimeBeforeClick, fWaitTimeAfterClick, fMaxUserCount, fOptimizeRelatedKeyword, fRemainingKeyword, fCreateTime ) VALUES ( #{groupSetting.pageRemainMinTime}, #{groupSetting.pageRemainMaxTime}, #{groupSetting.inputDelayMinTime}, #{groupSetting.inputDelayMaxTime}, #{groupSetting.slideDelayMinTime}, #{groupSetting.slideDelayMaxTime}, #{groupSetting.titleRemainMinTime}, #{groupSetting.titleRemainMaxTime}, #{groupSetting.optimizeKeywordCountPerIP}, #{groupSetting.oneIPOneUser}, #{groupSetting.randomlyClickNoResult}, #{groupSetting.justVisitSelfPage}, #{groupSetting.sleepPer2Words}, #{groupSetting.supportPaste}, #{groupSetting.moveRandomly}, #{groupSetting.parentSearchEntry}, #{groupSetting.clearLocalStorage}, #{groupSetting.lessClickAtNight}, #{groupSetting.sameCityUser}, #{groupSetting.locateTitlePosition}, #{groupSetting.baiduAllianceEntry}, #{groupSetting.waitTimeAfterClick}, #{groupSetting.maxUserCount}, #{groupSetting.optimizeRelatedKeyword}, #{groupSetting.remainingKeyword}, NOW() )
